attributes.action: Introduce a charge for travellers to pay for cleaning up once they have moved on
attributes.background: Some travellers who break into land cause damage which they do not have to pay for. This is wrong and creates a system with no incentive to stop them doing it again.
attributes.additional_details:
Around where we live land has been damaged including the local football field. It costs money to get court orders and repair the damage. 

All the council’s costs involved could and should be used for local people instead of wasted due to a lack of punishment to deter this behaviour.

attributes.action: Ireland Re-unification Talks
attributes.background: As part of The government's Brexit talks, there should be a discussion about a possible Re-Unification of Ireland. As Northern Ireland will now be our only physical border with the EU, some kind of border controls will have to be implemented, to stop any unrestricted movement across the UK border.
attributes.additional_details: Might I suggest that there is a clause that after a specified period of time (say six years) since we have officially left the EU, the people of both Ireland & Northern Ireland can decide whether they would like their current situation to stay the same, Northern Ireland to reunify with Ireland, or whether The Republic of Ireland would like to rejoin the United Kingdom.

attributes.action: Lower £18,600 to apply for a spouse visa or make it affordable to the citizens.
attributes.background:
Lower the £18,600 to apply for a spouse visa or make it affordable for the citizens.

* Young adults marrying abroad
• Hard to earn atleast £350 a week
• Taxes have increased significantly
• Work 5 days Monday - Friday after tax come out with £250. 
• Overtime pay should not be taxed
attributes.additional_details:
Lower the £18,600 to apply for a spouse visa or make it affordable for the citizens.

* Young adults marrying abroad
• Hard to earn atleast £350 a week
• Taxes have increased significantly
• Work 5 days Monday - Friday after tax come out with £250. 
• Overtime pay should not be taxed
• Work 7 days to earn the £350 a week no social life or time spent with family friends.
• Increase pay, reduce taxes or decrease the £18,600
• Work stress free with the weekend to your own self
• Let citizens live!

attributes.action: Legal minimum age to enter into marriage in UK to change from 16 to 18 years.
attributes.background:
Legal minimum age to enter into a marriage in England and Wales is 16 years, although this requires parental consent if a participant is under 18 years.
Changing the law to 18 years will have a huge positive impact on arranged or forced marriages here in England and Wales as some are forced at 16.
attributes.additional_details: When a child turns 18 they are expected to start making their own decisions and be treated like adults. They are obliged to take responsibility for their own lives, so why is the legal age of marriage in England and Wales 16 when they are still considered children? This is common in Asian communities where young 16 years old's are expected to marry and take on responsibility they are not ready for.  Does a 16 year old understand what marriage is at that age? Are they ready for this commitment?

attributes.action: Ban the use of zoos as a tourist attraction
attributes.background: Zoos set a limit on animal freedom, it is wrong that just because we are the dominant and most forward thinking species that we should capture and restraint the freedom of other animals for our own entertainment. I am petitioning to end animal captivity and give every animal the freedom it deserves.
attributes.additional_details: The world is developing at an extremely fast rate and traditions are not the only things fading out. It is estimated that 99% of all species that have lived on earth are now extinct, and over 150,000 become extinct every day. these animals have limited lives as it is, and it isn't right for us as a dominant and prosperous species to constrain the animals to a restricted life in a cage.

attributes.action: Reform the Misuse of Drugs Act
attributes.background:
We call upon the government to recognise that the “War on Drugs” has been a complete failure and that people will always take drugs regardless of the law.

We believe that all currently illegal drugs must be decriminalised with certain recreational drugs such as Cannabis being legalised completely
attributes.additional_details:
By continuing with our current war on drugs, we are facilitating criminal enterprises and causing the death of thousands of users through fake, dangerously cut drugs or synthetic replacements (So called Legal High’s).

We also need a new approach especially with the legalisation of Marijuana in certain US states and potentially the whole of Canada (in 2017). 

The world is changing. The criminals are happy with the current law, but we feel that it’s time to reform our 1970’s approach to drugs.

attributes.action: to give emotional support animals (dogs, cats) the same status as a service dog.
attributes.background: A emotional support animal is a animal that lives with a person with anxiety, ptsd, depression and people with social anxiety. the ESA accompanies the person wherever they go to reduce stress, anxiety or episodes of social anxiety and need it to be made compulsary to allow access to all buildings
attributes.additional_details: assistance dog owners have important rights under the Equality Act 2010 (EA). The EA provides for people with disabilities to have the same right to services supplied by shops, banks, hotels, libraries, pubs, taxis and restaurants as everyone else. It is against the law for service providers to treat people with disabilities less favourably because of their disability, or because they have a guide or assistance dog with them. this should be the same for emotional support cats & dogs.

attributes.action: Ban Zero Hour Contracts and ensure all employers offer 10 hours per week minimum
attributes.background: Employers are still taking on staff with zero hour contracts, meaning a large portion of the UK workforce has no idea what their income will be from one week to the next. Not only this, these jobs are often paid at the minimum wage which often makes life very hard for honest working people.

attributes.action: Require transport authorities to fund free concessionary fares for unpaid carers
attributes.background: Unpaid Carers (carers who do not provide care as a career) are a crucial part of society saving the government £162 billion every year. Travel is an essential service and yet, is a barrier that makes it harder for us to deal with our many responsibilities.
attributes.additional_details: Public transport is a service that is a need, we are an essential part of the community so why can't we use it too! Not everyone can get benefits so let's help carers get what they deserve, it may not seem important to most but to many it will change their lives. We deserve to be treated as equals...Is free/concessionary transport for carers to much to ask for in return for those who dedicate their lives to care for others?

attributes.action: Make it law that all ice rinks make you wear crash helmets and elbow protection.
attributes.background:
As a child growing up going ice skating i never wore crash helmets or elbow protection. 
As a adult taking my own children I have not made them either wear protection whilst Ice Skating, but when they go doughnutting they do wear crash helmets Recently i suffered a head injury ice skating.
attributes.additional_details:
I fell smashed my head on the Ice and have been suffering server concussion for 3 weeks and still recovering,So the last 3 weeks my 4 children , grandma and my husband all have to look after me as I have not been able to do anything . 

Please read about concussion and sign the petition keep all our children and parents safe . Thank you for your time

attributes.action: Make Ebooks (Kindle, etc) free from VAT.
attributes.background: Books are zero rated in UK for VAT because of their cultural and educational value. However, Ebooks (e.g. those delivered to Kindle etc) are not, but are hit by 20% VAT. Given that 'virtual' books do not require  destruction of forests, printing and distribution this is clearly unfair. Zero rate now

attributes.action: Ban the breeding and sale of Pugs, Bulldogs and Shar Peis in the UK
attributes.background: These breeds of dogs have many health problems and is unfair that they have to live like this. Therefore it should be illegal to breed or purchase these dogs.

attributes.action: Give the NHS a percentage of tuition fees from all HE health careers courses.
attributes.background: The NHS would benefit from extra funding. They should be given a percentage of tuition fees from all health careers courses. Students studying these courses should oblige as the NHS is the future for the majority of their career. The extra funds would help with the upkeep and development of the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is suffering from a lack of funding and a lack of staff. If they were to recieve a percentage of student tuition fees (only from health related courses) then there would be a boost in funding. It could also be an incentive to encourage more people to study these courses and eventually work for the NHS, as they would feel as though there University costs have contributed to their future career on another level.

attributes.action: Stop state funded translation services in all NHS facilities.
attributes.background: The NHS spend over £23M per year on providing translation services - that's around £63,000 per day !!  That money could and should be spent on equipment/services that benefit everyone instead of a small minority.
attributes.additional_details:
Translation services that are required should be paid for by the person requiring the services, their friends, family or privately funded migrant support groups.
Implementing this change get will not only reduce expenditure on non medical NHS funding but also provide an additional incentive for migrants to learn English and assimilate into UK society.

attributes.action: Stop Privatisation of Lancaster Post Office
attributes.background: Lancaster Post Office has become a historic local institution providing a wide range of services. Relocating it could reduce the service offered to customers in the long run, make access difficult for the disabled and the elderly and would be unsuitable for people who don't like crowded spaces.
attributes.additional_details: The current post office is spacious which enables it to offer a wide range of services, it is on the ground floor, very close to town centre, is a couple of minutes walk from a large car park on Dallas Road and is next door to the local Royal Mail Delivery Office. W.H Smiths would offer non of these advantages except the fact it is in town centre because there is no nearby parking and having postal vans would have to go through a pedestrianised area.

attributes.action: Prevent the sale of ARM Holdings to Softbank
attributes.background: The government should prevent the sale of ARM, the biggest and most successful British technology company to the Japanese company Softbank.  With designs used in over 90% of devices, the idea that only another company can support its growth is invalid.
attributes.additional_details:
If the government truly believes in businesses that can compete in the world then it must realise it takes decades to develop companies such as ARM and coming under foreign ownership when not needed is only ultimately strategically beneficial for the foreign company and bad for national self-esteem.  

The sale of ARM will represent the end of real British involvement in any significant way in the ever-growing, ever important technology sector.

attributes.action: Allow CCW in the UK for self defence
attributes.background: With violent crime at a whole time high in the UK.   And with the major threat of another terror attack,  it is a human right to be able to defend ourselves against this situation.  It is time for the right to CCW. (Conceal carry )   gun ownership for self defense can work in the UK.  Safely
attributes.additional_details: People always say the uk doesn't want to decommissioning another America when it comes to guns,  the media only report the criminal aspect of guns, they never report on the lives saved by the gun,  the crime stopped by the gun,   guns were banned after the Dunblane killings, but think.  If the kids were killed by a kitchen knife. Would the government have banned all kitchen knives, no..  gun ownership can work for self defense in the UK.  It is YOUR  human right to be able to protect yourself

attributes.action: Change the conveyancing process in England to make buying & selling more secure.
attributes.background: I have been working in the property industry since 2000 and now own my own Estate Agency firm. Over the last 16 years I have seen thousands of people who have been messed around by buyers and sellers alike. This has resulted in heartache, stress and the loss of substantial amounts of money.
attributes.additional_details: On average over 30% of sales fall through each year in England, the knock on effect of this can ruin people’s lives. Almost every country around the world other than England dictates that both, buyers and sellers have to pay a NON refundable deposit to secure the property. If either party withdraw the deposit is forfeited. In England a buyer or seller can pull out up to the day of exchange. One thoughtless person can ruin people’s lives with no consequence. Let's put a stop to it.

attributes.action: New Prime Minister Theresa May suspend HS2 until Brexit negotiations complete
attributes.background:
Economic case for HS2 can't be justified until all Brexit negotiations complete & or 2nd referendum.
Under Brexit if carried out, London may no longer retain hub status. If Scotland negotiates to remain in EU, strong economic case for HS2 Phase1 connecting northern England with Edinburgh & Glasgow
attributes.additional_details:
Assumptions of HS2 economic projections are based on London being at focal point of connection between UK & other European countries. Logic may now not hold true.
Until full scale of Brexit negotiations are known economic case for HS2 is tenuous.
If after Brexit negotiations on UK leaving EU, Scotland negotiates to remain part of EU, perfectly conceivable Edinburgh & Glasgow could become significant economic hubs in their own right. Trade is more likely to flow via Scotland in such a scenario.

attributes.action: Scrap the BBC and sell all assets for the NHS to save people £150 pa for life
attributes.background: The BBC has become an expensive white elephant with anything but a public service as its main goal. It is becoming extremely political and targeting minorities and politicians alike. It is time to make good use of its assets by selling it all and earmaking all proceeds to go to the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The use of subliminal images by the BBC in targeting minorities or immigrants or even Scotland is disgusting. It has political agendas far beyond its remit and even targets politicians. Even if you do not like Jeremy Cobyn, one day it could be any other politician which does not serve the ultimate controller of the BBC.

The NHS which is depleted and suffering could make better use of these resources for the welfare of the nation. And people would be less taxed too by its excesses of the BBC.

attributes.action: Change the gambling age to 21+ now!
attributes.background: With more and more gambling sites appearing, new bookies opening daily, and the sponsorships of Gambling companies appearing all over, and around our sport teams stadiums and merchandise. Our younger generation is constantly force fed and reminded of these companies.
attributes.additional_details: With a National Lottery ticket you must be 16+, Any bookies and/or Casino 18+, I feel if we postpone the ability to gamble, this will have massive benefits to the younger generation as they'll have a much better understanding of money and it's worth at the age of 21, as opposed to 16/18. Let's take control of early addiction, and encourage our own self-success.

attributes.action: Make the Sure Start Maternity Grant Equal to ALL babies!
attributes.background: When having a baby, you're entitled to apply for a Sure Start Maternity Grant.  However if you/partner dont receive benefits you are immediately singled out and unable to claim, therefore stating just because you earn a living you baby does not have the right to an equal £500.00 kick start to life!

attributes.action: Make ALL central & local govt. consultations fully transparent and accountable
attributes.background: The larger the public consultation the less public it is. That's because, if the cost of protecting personal data exceeds the £450-600 cap individual comments aren't published. This must change: in a transparent democracy our opinions must be seen, and a clear FOR or AGAINST tally system included.
attributes.additional_details: To avoid any biased government interpretations & calculations of our concerns and wishes, we propose the public always be given access to ALL government consultation materials: http://tiny.cc/gov-data. Our personal data (except postcodes for demographic analysis) should automatically be blacked-out from the outset, and the £ caps scrapped. And, if we are to have any confidence in published consultation results, a simple system to show whether we are FOR or AGAINST a proposal must be introduced.

attributes.action: Owners of UK media should be registered to vote and pay taxes within the UK.
attributes.background: Our democracy requires balanced and accountable news media. Part of the 'fit and proper person' test for owning a significant portion of our media should be that they are eligible to vote and pay taxes, so that they, like the rest of us, are fully part of the political environment they help shape.

attributes.action: A  Vote of No Confidence in the Transport Secretary re Southern Railways dispute
attributes.background: The Transport Secretary has made it clear  he has no interest in the Southern/RMT/ASLEF rail dispute. People have lost their jobs, been refused job interviews & in some cases missed hospital appointments. His lack of action is grossly negligent and he should no longer be a government minister.

attributes.action: Child Maintenance Service to calculate payments based on annual basic net pay.
attributes.background: Calculations shouldn't include overtime, shift allowances nor any bonuses.
attributes.additional_details: Receiving parents to provide evidence of what they spend child maintenance on

attributes.action: Make it mandatory to show ID for age restricted products being purchased
attributes.background: Retail workers are fed up of being yelled at unfairly for following procedure when requesting ID for age restricted goods. They are at risk whenever a sale goes through. NO ID = NO SALE means a drastic reduction in this risk, and the onus is on consumers - NOT retail workers.
attributes.additional_details: I'm a retail worker. The very day i started this petition, i had been yelled at by a customer for requesting ID in order to ensure i could process the sale of Vodka. DVDs, Video Games, Fireworks, Knives. NO ID = NO SALE means the cashier is no longer at risk, has confidence to check ID without fear of intimidation and consequence,  put's the onus on the customer to ensure they have ID. This simple change would help prevent under age sales, knife crime, and give everyone confidence in the system.

attributes.action: Amend prior approval for phone masts to include a minimum distance from houses
attributes.background: There is currently no minimum distance stipulated for masts. They are cautious not to site masts next to playgrounds and schools but are happy to site them next to residential gardens with established play areas. Neighbours should actually be consulted prior to the submission of an application.
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous examples across the country of mobile phone companies exploiting the relaxed planning rules by trying to site masts within so called 'breaks in the residential nature of the search area'. If the LPA does not refuse or grant an application for prior approval within 56 days its prior approval is automatically deemed to have been given and the mast can be built even if it is within a few metres of a residential property. The process needs to be far more transparent.

attributes.action: Ban the sale to, and possession by, civilians of combat daggers and bayonets.
attributes.background: These weapons' sole function is to kill - they can have no place in civilian ownership and yet are legally available to any UK adult. This is a legal loophole which could be easily closed.
attributes.additional_details: I am a secondary school teacher and work in the Security industry.

attributes.action: Remove Toll On Queen Elizabeth the 2nd Tunnel if in traffic longer than 30mins
attributes.background: I cross this bridge everyday and I have had enough like many others paying £2.50 and upwards to be stuck in traffic for hours

attributes.action: Require all universities by law to consider applications anonymously.
attributes.background: Recent studies have shown that perfectly able candidates are not being offered the same opportunities due to 'name discrimination'. This can be in the form of prejudice surrounding names related to ethnic origin or even gender discrimination within big companies that would like more male employees.
attributes.additional_details:
-Dr. Colin Holbrook, a research scientist at the UCLA Center for Behavior, Evolution, and Culture has recently done a study showing that names have an influence on job interviews and university places in terms of race and gender.
-By making it law for organisations such as UCAS to require anonymous applications it will hopefully prevent discrimination against those with ethnic-sounding or just clear gender identifiable names, based on stereotypes.

attributes.action: Raise the Speed limit on Motorways in the UK from 70mph to 90mph.
attributes.background: The 70mph speed limit on UK motorways was introduced in 1966. since then the technology and safety features of cars has come on considerably. it is now time to embrace this change and accept that it is safe for cars to drive at this speed. it will also help to reduce congestion on motorways.

attributes.action: Provide free accommodation for ex-service personnel
attributes.background: As Veterans have served our country and risked their lives, why should they be left out in the cold with no food or water. All Veterans should be given accommodation after leaving the Forces until they are able to support themselves again.

attributes.action: Create a single Bullying Law that applies to all Schools in England
attributes.background: Schools are letting pupils down by not taking Bullying seriously and ignoring their policies. There needs to be a Law on Bullying that all Schools have to abide by. There are Children taking their own lives and i feel this would stop if there was a law that made schools help.
attributes.additional_details: News Articles. My own experience with my Child. I have spoken to numerous other Parents about their experiences too

attributes.action: Please don't wage another war in the ME after Iraq,Libya,Afghanistan now Syria!
attributes.background: Please send no troops, SAS special forces and clandestine operations into Syria. Unless Syria declares war on us, we shell stay neutral and not get involved in this war. We have our own country to care for. And we caused enough suffering and damage to the Middle East already. Please save the peace!
attributes.additional_details: The war on Iraq was based on a lie. The war on Libya caused death and suffering to the Libyan Nation and extreme damage to the security of Europe and the whole world. Yemen was bombed for many years by drones now by Saudis. Afghanistan is turning back into a unsafe war torn country under the rule of Taliban. Please save Syria and stay out of it. Let the Syrian Government and their Allies deal with their problem. Its not our Country. Not our war. We have a beautiful country to care for!

attributes.action: Tackle the pay gap between men and women.
attributes.background:
According to AAUW, the pay gap won’t close until 2152 - lets change that.
Why should women be paid 20% less than a man doing exactly the same job?
Please sign this petition and help us take one more step towards gender equality.

attributes.action: Put cameras on Humber Bridge to catch speeders, tailgaters & poor drivers
attributes.background: The bridge is often closed for hours on end because theres been an accident caused by someones poor driving. The speed limit is 50, but drivers often go upwards of 60. The drivers are inches away from other car bumpers, trying to intimidate the other cars into going faster than the 50 limit
attributes.additional_details: There are cameras at the booths. These have witnessed road rage incidents, & drivers going through the tag lane above 50 (the limit at the booths is 30)

attributes.action: A newborn baby to be screened for Krabbe Disease
attributes.background: I have a best friend that tried years to get pregnant. When she finally become pregnant she was over the moon. She then become pregnant with her second child which was then found out to have Krabbe Disease at 13 months old which there is currently no cure for and they don't screen for when born.
attributes.additional_details: In America they screen newborn babies for Krabbe Disease but not in the uk. This is a very serious condition which there is no cure. It is a gene which one or both parents carry and can pass it on to the child without even knowing. If it's not found early enough then a child can die by the age of two years with late onset Krabbe Diease. This needs to become part of screening with a newborn ASAP. Please help make this happen!!

attributes.action: Give English voters a say in the event of a 2nd Scottish Independence referendum
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon is calling for a new Referendum on Scottish Independence. In the event such a referendum is granted, we demand that a vote is given to all English voters to give us a choice on whether or not we want to keep Scotland, and move our military contracts South of the Border to England!
attributes.additional_details: http://www.msn.com/en-gb/news/uknews/nicola-sturgeon-launches-second-scottish-independence-referendum-drive-after-brexit-vote/ar-AAioSmM?li=BBoPWjQ

attributes.action: The U.K. Military should under no circumstances engage in the defence of Turkey
attributes.background: Given the recent provocative attacks of Turkey in the Middle East and provocations against Russia from Turkey the UK should not deploy any of its military forces as part of a NATO defence of turkey should they be counter attacked by countries that Turkey is antagonising.

attributes.action: Commit to improve transgender healthcare in the UK
attributes.background:
In July 2016, I polled 100 transgender people and 60% reported their experience at a gender identity clinic (GIC) was detrimental to their mental health. 

The process of proving the validity of your gender in order to receive treatment harms individuals and it must be changed.
attributes.additional_details:
Full survey found on Beyond the Binary. While GICs are currently working towards reducing waiting times, the entire process is broken.

By signing this petition, we are asking the government to:

- Pledge more funds towards trans health care to address admin problems.
- Prioritise the work of the Equalities Office to address the harm that GICs are doing.
- Anything else that can be done to address the lack of NICE guidelines for treating gender dysphoria and means of treatment.

attributes.action: Return the District Councils to Cornwall
attributes.background:
Since Cornwall Council was formed it has wasted so much money. 

It is time for the government to return Cornwall to District Councils and to abolish Cornwall Council.

attributes.action: Health Research Tax on all UK Taxpayers - let's finally cure Cancer and the rest
attributes.background:
A new tax used to fund Health Research, a small amount taken every month from all taxpayers and used to fund medical research. Suggested monthly figure for UK tax brackets:

Basic - 40p
Higher - 50p
Additional - £1

Such a small amount per person will generate £100m+ per year (HMRC Stats).
attributes.additional_details:
Based on HMRC Stats for 2016 tax year:

24.7m Basic rate = £9.8m
4.4m Higher rate = £2.2m
0.3m Additional rate = £0.3m
Total = £12.4m p/m

Funds to be given to single disease until cured then move to next (order TBD).

Suggest management board made of unpaid visionaries who are only interested in making the world better (i.e. Musk, Branson, Dyson etc.)

The Ice Bucket Challenge raised £87m for ALS research leading to the discovery of a gene that will allow them to start developing treatments.

attributes.action: Make a&e more equipped with private room& bathroom when dealing with miscarriage
attributes.background: Its the most horrific experience for a women and her partner to go throught and should be dealt with respectful no women should have to sit in a room full of people or have to clean herself up in a dirty bathroom that drunks go in in a&e

attributes.action: Change to the Lifetime ISA rules (re: transferring from Help to Buy ISA)
attributes.background:
Allow Help to Buy savers who have 
- saved for over a year and 
- are going to transfer their savings into the Lifetime ISA on 06/04/2017 in order to purchase a home at over the £250,000 cap
be able to purchase a home at any point once the Lifetime ISA is open rather than wait another year.
attributes.additional_details:
"those who already have a Help to Buy: ISA will be able to transfer these funds into a Lifetime ISA and receive the government bonus on those savings...In line with the normal Lifetime ISA rules, Help to Buy: ISA savers will be able to purchase a first home with the government bonus 12 months from the date of opening their Lifetime ISA."

Source: https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/508176/Lifetime_ISA_final.pdf [Accessed 31/07/2016]

attributes.action: Do not open a UK trade hub in any state that discriminates against LGBT+ people
attributes.background: The Department for International Trade, led by Dr Liam Fox who has the worst LGBT+ voting record of any cabinet member, intends to open a UK trade hub in Raleigh, North Carolina. This is despite the fact that the state's HB2 permits businesses to directly discriminate against the LGBT+ community.
attributes.additional_details:
HMG should join Paypal, HP, Deutsche Bank and others in refusing to support North Carolina until HB2 is repealed.

The DfIT has a duty not to send its LGBT+ staff, contractors and their families to states which treat them as second class citizens in a climate of fear and prejudice.

HMG has a duty to the global LGBT+ community to send a clear signal, even to our allies, that this discrimination is totally unacceptable. HMG must stand up for those struggling against injustice everywhere.

attributes.action: Pensioners should get the same amount of money as immigrants not 6000 pa
attributes.background: Pensioners only get 150 a week to live on barely enough for food let alone clothes heating and immigrants get thousands we should be looking after are old not helping them to suffer
attributes.additional_details: Pensioners 6000 per year immigrants 26000 sometimes more

attributes.action: Stop members of terrorist organisations such as ISIS returning to the UK
attributes.background: I think that terrorist members shouldn't be aloud as they are a threat to national security. They've been acting against British laws and they are against British values and it has been reported that thousands of ISIS fighters have been granted permission to come back into the country
attributes.additional_details: If they re-enter the United Kingdom then I think that they should stand trial.

attributes.action: Local Council Register all fitness professionals that can practice legitimately
attributes.background: Currently there is no regulation of non qualified fitness professionals from practising without qualifications and insurance. To maintain standards a register of all trading fitness/massage persons working/earning should be controlled by local councils. REPS and CIMSPA can only regulate upon members
attributes.additional_details: Poor quality and lack of knowledge isn't the way forward to providing good exercise prescription. This just simply isn't safe if you are charging the client or giving it for free. If you have no qualifications/experience you can mislead people into thinking you can training healthy people or people with diagnosed medical conditions or injuries or even have no insurance. We must raise the standard of what clients have as a fitness professional and impose some kind of penalty.

attributes.action: Call on the Saudi Arabian leaders to decriminalise homosexuality
attributes.background: In Saudi Arabia, same-sex sexual activity is punishable by floggings, life imprisonment, chemical castration, whipping torture and even the death penalty. People convicted twice are executed. Please call on the Saudi Arabian government to end the suffering of homosexuals in Saudi Arabia.
